name: market for mixed natural gas and biomethane, high pressure | mixed natural gas and biomethane, high pressure | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/22685/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This dataset represents the market for the grid mix of natural gas and biomethane (from purified biogas).;The gas mixture meets the quality requirements of natural gas, it has a methane content of at least 96% by volume and can be used for the same applications as natural gas. The share of biomethane in the grid is determined by the preceeding mixing activity, "mixed natural gas and biomethane production, high pressure".

The activity starts with the gas mix in the high pressure distribution grid, ready for delivery to the user.

The activity ends with the delivery of the gas mix to the user. It does not include transport requirements and losses to avoid double counting, since these are accounted for in the market datasets for the separate gasses.
category: D:Electricity, gas, steam and air conditioning supply/35:Electricity, gas, steam and air conditioning supply/352:Manufacture of gas; distribution of gaseous fuels through mains/3520:Manufacture of gas; distribution of gaseous fuels through mains

processDocumentation.geographyDescription: The share of biomethane in the natural gas grid is specific to Switzerland, as defined in the activity "mixed natural gas and biomethane production, high pressure, CH".
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: The two mixed products are aligned in quality (e.g. methane content).
